docs.summary: Create and manage album, sets and items.

params.name: galleryItemsLimit
params.doc: the amount of items in a gallery per response, default is 50

params.name: galleriesOffset
params.doc: the amount of galleries to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

params.name: galleriesLimit
params.doc: the amount of galleries in an album per response, default is 10

params.name: offset
params.doc: the amount of items to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

params.name: limit
params.doc: the amount of items per response, default is 50

params.name: offset
params.doc: the amount of items to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

params.name: limit
params.doc: the amount of items per response, default is 50

params.name: offset
params.doc: the amount of albums to skip in the current sort order, default is 0

params.name: limit
params.doc: the amount of albums per response, default is 10

params.name: galleriesLimit
params.doc: the amount of galleries in an album per response, default is 10

params.name: galleryItemsLimit
params.doc: the amount of items in a gallery per response, default is 50

members.name: url
members.doc: The url of the page

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: target
members.doc: Where this link should open, supports _self and _blank or any name the user chooses. _self means same page, _blank means new page.

members.name: anchorName
members.doc: The name of the anchor

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: pageId
members.doc: The page id we want from the site

members.name: routerId
members.doc: The router that handles this link

members.name: innerRoute
members.doc: The path data we'd like

members.name: anchorDataId
members.doc: The data id (from the JSON page) of the anchor that should be used

members.name: docId
members.doc: The id of the document

members.name: name
members.doc: The name of the document for download purposes

members.name: indexable
members.doc: If this document can be indexed by scrapers, default is false

members.name: recipient
members.doc: The email we will be sending a message to

members.name: subject
members.doc: The subject of the email

members.name: body
members.doc: The body of the email

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The phone number we want to link to

members.name: address
members.doc: An address that we can link to

members.name: phoneNumber
members.doc: The whatsApp phone number we want to connect with

members.name: name
members.doc: item's original filename

members.name: description
members.doc: item's description

members.name: mediaUrl
members.doc: item url for photos or video

members.name: id
members.doc: item id

members.name: link
members.doc: a link from the item to something else

members.name: orderIndex
members.doc: if not present in an update it mean the item will be added as currentTimestamp

members.name: title
members.doc: item's title

members.name: dataType
members.doc: item type: text, photo or video

members.name: watermarkToken
members.doc: item token is needed when is_secure is true.

members.name: quality
members.doc: the image quality

members.name: unsharpMasking
members.doc: unsharp masking (aka usm) parameters

members.name: amount
members.doc: number controls the amount of contrast that is added at the edges.

members.name: radius
members.doc: number in pixels. The size of the edges to be enhanced

members.name: threshold
members.doc: The minimal level of brightness change that will be sharpened

members.name: externalId
members.doc: External source's representation for this video's id

members.name: html
members.doc: 1. deps in other css classes? 2. protection 3. how do you render it? without scripting allowed

members.name: style
members.doc: css style info for container

members.name: editorHtml
members.doc: populated via progallery app only (ck editor format)

members.name: editorFontId
members.doc: the wix editor's font Id used to display the text data

members.name: wixLinkData
members.doc: Data on how to construct the link from wix editor inputs

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Map representing the file format (eg mp4)  to the url. In case of an external source the format can be youtube, vimeo, etc.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type string

members.name: videoMode
members.doc: eg 720p, 1024p etc

members.name: urls
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Map representing the file format (eg mp4)  to the url. In case of an external source the format can be youtube, vimeo, etc.

members.name: id
members.doc: set id

members.name: name
members.doc: set name

members.name: totalItemsCount
members.doc: sum of all items in set

members.name: items
members.doc: a subset of the items in the set

members.name: createdDate
members.doc: timestamp for set creation

members.name: orderIndex
members.doc: if not present in an update it mean the item will be added as currentTimestamp

members.doc: number of sets in the album

members.name: store
members.doc: true if the album is a store and watermark should be in use

members.doc: watermark properties

members.name: imageRatio
members.doc: used to calculate the width of the watermark

members.name: imageUrl
members.doc: The url of the watermark in media

members.name: opacity
members.doc: The transparency of the watermark

members.name: position
members.doc: The position of the watermark on the item, represented as a 3x3 grid

members.name: size
members.doc: The size of the watermark

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Wix
  • DeviantArt
  • Custom

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Photo
  • Video
  • Text

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • Youtube
  • Vimeo
  • Custom

Possible values are:
  • Undefined
  • External - external link
  • Internal - link to wix pages

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • SAVED
  • PUBLISHED
